thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Never Mind the Defaults, Venezuela Has Made Many Bondholders Rich

author: Julie Wernau
title: Never Mind the Defaults, Venezuela Has Made Many Bondholders Rich
text:
Venezuelaâ€™s bonds have lost about three-quarters of their value, reflecting a dozen missed payments by the government and the state-owned oil company.
But many of their bondholders are still feeling flush.
That is because a number of investors have made their money back and more, thanks to coupon payments topping 13% and large principal payments...
